title: In the Pink with the The Sopranos on The Cigar Authority
itunes:title: In the Pink with the The Sopranos on The Cigar Authority
description: Fahgitaboutit!  Today on The Cigar Authority Joseph R. Gannascoli, aka Vito from the Sopranos, joins us to talk about  his new exclusive Ashtray, and Geoff Pinkus, aka The Pinker, from Livin' Large (It's a Man Show) checks in.  We get a visit from Christopher Harper from Perdomo Cigars as we smoke the Perdomo 10th Anniversary Champagne and Maduro.  It's time for the finer things in life...It's time for the Cigar Authority!
